Text:
Thank you very much for these - my mother loves Sidney Sheldon's books, and I'm going to load the Kindle I'm giving her for Mother's Day with as many of her favorite authors as I can find!

You are a true treasure, KK...
Thanks for another awesome UL KK!
Do you by chance have The Replacement Wife by Eileen Goudge
Ty so much KK your back in style :)
Thanks so much, this fills in the holes in my collection. I love his books!
